projects.name: Cryptograph
projects.description: This was a really fun project and deals with encoding and decoding secret messages. You can choose from several different bases like morse or binary. You can also enter a secret key (optional) but don't lose it or your message will never be decoded!! Check the info page on the website for more details.

projects.name: ProTrac
projects.description: This is a fullstack web app built for monitoring your productivity. I realy enjoyed working on this since it uses a database and proper server side logic. I enjoy putting things together and to make them work seamlessly. The goal was to make a simple UI that is easy to use but still performs all the functions for the app to work. this project was approached with the idea of future expandibility for when I want to add features easily without changing the base design.

projects.name: Pokedex
projects.description: This website uses the pokedex API and uses several API calls that are connected. the focus is on simplicity and working with API's. I chose this particular API because it's a fun idea to play with and the API itself is very robust and complete even though that adds an extra layer of complexity to the logic.

projects.name: Paint Magic
projects.description: This website focuses on design and UI. It's a fictional website for an art school. this website was made with a mobile first approach and encorporates 3D interactive animations and other popular design trends.
